name: Rolling Maze
description:
Welcome to the mysterious world of neon labyrinths where you're going to become a true hero!
Enjoy the exciting challenge! Your main goal is to go through tricky labyrinths as far as possible, collect coins and unlock new features which can contribute to your ultimate victory!

BREATHTAKING GAMEPLAY
√ Control your ball via gyroscope or screen taps
√ 3 endless levels with increasing difficulty
√ Static and dynamic obstacles
√ Unique soundtracks for each level
√ Lots of extra bonuses and power-ups

3 POWERFUL BONUSES
√ Shield – no danger from your collisions with other objects
√ Magnet – attract coins as you progress through the level
√ Time Delay – slow down the speed of your ball

5 TYPES OF BALLS
√ Ordinary
√ With Extra life
√ With Shield feature
√ With Time Delay feature
√ With Magnet feature

Let's start - control your champion ball and overcome all obstacles on your way!
